snippet: Anti-Semitic remarks that President Mohamed Morsi of Egypt made in 2010 have raised doubts about his efforts to present himself as a force for moderation.
abstract: Anti-Semitic remarks made by Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi in 2010, when he was leader of the Muslim Brotherhood, are raising doubts about his efforts to present himself as a force of moderation; disclosures of virulent remarks, documented on video, have strengthened the position of those who say Israel’s Arab neighbors are unwilling to commit to peace with the Jewish state.
lead_paragraph: Anti-Semitic remarks that President Mohamed Morsi of Egypt made in 2010 have raised doubts about his efforts to present himself as a force for moderation.

headline.seo: Egypt’s Leader, Morsi, Made Anti-Jewish Slurs
headline.main: Morsi’s Slurs Against Jews Stir Concern
headline.print_headline: Morsi’s Slurs Against Jews Stir Concern
